About Me

Hi! My name is Arun Das, a second year undergraduate student at Indian Institute of Information Technology Nagpur. I may also be known as qazz625 or aert online. I specialize in data structures and loving solving puzzles and algorithmic challenges and had been a participant in the ACM-ICPC Regionals. I am an active participant in competitive coding contests on Codechef and Codeforces. For more details feel free to have a look at my resume and profiles give below.
